パッケージ io.github.yoshikawaa.gfw.spring.boot.autoconfigure.web

クラス TerasolunaGfwServletAutoConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.github.yoshikawaa.gfw.spring.boot.autoconfigure.web.TerasolunaGfwServletAutoConfiguration
@Configuration(proxyBeanMethods=false) @ConditionalOnWebApplication(type=SERVLET) @ConditionalOnClass({org.terasoluna.gfw.web.logging.HttpSessionEventLoggingListener.class,org.terasoluna.gfw.web.logging.mdc.MDCClearFilter.class,org.terasoluna.gfw.web.logging.mdc.XTrackMDCPutFilter.class}) @AutoConfigureBefore(org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.security.servlet.SecurityAutoConfiguration.class) public class TerasolunaGfwServletAutoConfiguration extends Object
Spring Boot Auto Configuration for Web of terasoluna-gfw-web, terasoluna-gfw-security-web.
作成者:
Atsushi Yoshikawa

      @Bean public org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.ServletListenerRegistrationBean<org.terasoluna.gfw.web.logging.HttpSessionEventLoggingListener> configureHttpSessionEventLoggingListener()

      戻り値:

    • configureUserIdMDCPutFilter

      @Bean @ConditionalOnClass({org.terasoluna.gfw.security.web.logging.UserIdMDCPutFilter.class,org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain.class}) public org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain configureUserIdMDCPutFilter(org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity http) throws Exception
      Apply UserIdMDCPutFilter after AnonymousAuthenticationFilter.
      パラメータ:
      http - HttpSecurity
      戻り値:
      Configured SecurityFilterChain
      例外:
      Exception - failed to build SecurityFilterChain
